name: Free Online API Key Generator - ATools
description: Free online API key generator with multiple key formats, secure high-strength random generation, all processing completed locally in browser.
seoDescription: Professional developer's essential free API key generation tool - ATools - Supports multiple API key format generation including JWT Token, Bearer Token, API Key, Secret Key, random strings etc. Secure high-strength random algorithms with custom length and character sets. Suitable for REST API, microservices, database keys, encryption keys and other scenarios. Real-time generation, batch generation, one-click copy. Completely local generation, no server dependency, 100% protects key security. Clean and intuitive interface, simple and efficient operation, is a professional tool for development team key management and security configuration. Completely free and open source, supports multiple common key formats, is the trusted security tool for global technical teams!

ui.title: API Key Generator
ui.description: Securely generate various types of API keys with support for custom formats and batch generation
ui.apiKeyDescription: Standard alphanumeric combination, suitable for REST API
ui.secretDescription: Base64 encoded, suitable for encryption purposes
ui.securityFeature1: Uses browser Crypto API to generate true random numbers
ui.securityFeature3: Can add custom prefix to identify usage
ui.securityFeature6: Completely local generation, no network transmission risk
ui.securityWarningText: Generated keys are only displayed in the current session. Please save them properly. Change keys regularly to improve security.
